summary: Basic Human Needs mod with lighter bottles.
descriptionHtml:
I loved the Basic Human Needs - Food Drink and Sleep by Andrewpk, but felt the bottles were too heavy.
A full water bottle weights 10, while a full liquor bottle weights 0.5

So I changed only the bottles\' weight, and repacked everything, so the original mod won\'t be necessary.

Full Bottle from 10 to 0.5
Almost Full Bottle from 6.6 to 0.4
Almost Empty Bottle from 3.3 to 0.2
Empty Bottle from 1 to 0.1

All credit goes to Andrewpk for his amazing mod!

Enjoy!
author: Andrewpk and diegocmr
